description: Try our easy to follow Orange And Carrot Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Orange,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Orange And Carrot Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, zested and sliced into 5mm-thick rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C fan-forced. Line a muffin tin with papers.
Place flour, bicarb soda, cinnamon and ginger in a mixing bowl and stir to combine.
Add remaining ingredients and fold with spatula until just combined. Note: do not overwork the batter or it will become tough.
Cut orange slices into quarters. Divide mixture evenly between muffin holes, top each with an orange quarter and bake for 20 minutes. Cool on a wire rack.
